EmailTemplate.name: IPRD Notify Owner On IP Project Association
EmailTemplate.subject: New IP Project has been linked to IP Request {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
Your IP request {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} has been added to the following IP project {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.IP_Project__c}.
Thanks.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
